name: Woten
description:
"Somewhere on this island sits the legendary Tree of Life, upon whose mighty branches grows a golden fruit of AWESOME power!"

Woten is a short and sweet 2D puzzle-platformer infused with the spirit of discovery.

Jump, climb and headbutt your way through a strange and puzzling landscape!

Observe, predict and manipulate the behavior of a menagerie of cute and curious creatures as you carve a path across the island. Use your head to get ahead!

Can you unearth the secrets of the mysterious Fossil Range?
